Desc.entry: Pedal Ready is a not-for-profit cycle training co-operative supported by Sheffield City Council whose aim is to encourage people to use cycle transport. Offers instructor-led cycle training courses in work places and schools as well as one-to-one training sessions for adults. Holds Dr. Bike safety check sessions, which are free basic cycle repair sessions to ensure bicycle safety. Also organises free rides and cycle events for the public and delivers "Cycle for Health" a 6 week health focused cycling course currently available at Endcliffe, Hillsborough, High Hazels and Greenhill Parks and PACES at High Green. Most courses are free to Sheffield residents. Company limited by guarantee no 5527951.
